Topic Summary: Appellant is contesting that he is exempt from VAT on the provision of medical services as a acupuncturist.
Tax Legislation: Section 2, Section 47, Part 1 of Schedule 1, Schedule 3 of Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010; Chapter 2 of Title IX of Council Directive 2006/112/EC; Sections 3, 4, 79(1), 90 and 91 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005;
